types:type.name: routes
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type routes = Array<{| originLocation: {| locationCode: String |}, destinationLocation: {| locationCode: String |}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\"},\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"}},{\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\"},\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"}}]"}

types:type.name: schedules_example
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type schedules_example = Array<{| availableSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureDateTime: String, travelRoute: {| destinationLocation: {| locationCode: String |}, originLocation: {| locationCode: String |} |}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"availableSeats\\\":20,\\\"departureDateTime\\\":\\\"2019-04-30T16:41:41.090Z\\\",\\\"travelRoute\\\":{\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"},\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\"}}},{\\\"availableSeats\\\":30,\\\"departureDateTime\\\":\\\"2019-04-30T16:41:41.090Z\\\",\\\"travelRoute\\\":{\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"},\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BL-SG\\\"}}}]"}

types:type.name: sched_db
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type sched_db = Array<{| availableSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, companyName: String, destinationLocationCode: String, departureDate: String, originLocationCode: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"availableSeats\\\":40,\\\"companyName\\\":\\\"TravelOnTip\\\",\\\"destinationLocationCode\\\":\\\"MKT\\\",\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2023-02-09T04:18:18\\\",\\\"originLocationCode\\\":\\\"MNL\\\"},{\\\"availableSeats\\\":30,\\\"companyName\\\":\\\"TravelOnTip\\\",\\\"destinationLocationCode\\\":\\\"MNL\\\",\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2023-02-10T08:34:29\\\",\\\"originLocationCode\\\":\\\"MKT\\\"}]"}
